key_risks: Profitability challenges with negative adjusted EBITDA and net margin
Dependence on third-party manufacturers leading to quality control and supply chain risks
Intense competition from digital and traditional manufacturers
controversies: Pricing pressure on suppliers leading to low profit margins
Potential issues with part quality and delivery timelines
social_issues: Supplier relations and sustainability concerns due to low profit margins
Customer experience issues with part quality and delivery timelines

sources.title: Who even makes parts for Xometry, and are they going to become popular ...
sources.snippet: As a supplier, we bear all the costs of machining, materials, and quality control, yet our profit margin was severely squeezed under Xometry's strict pricing pressure. Despite maintaining high-quality standards and ensuring every part met customer requirements, our profit margin on each order was less than 5%.
